Package org.adm.graph.core

Interface Summary
EdgeWeight Encapsulate a comparable which can also be added and defines a zero weight Should be used if the Graph Edge weights are not Integers
IHeap<E> Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
ITraversalHandler<E> Interface for graph traversal
 

Class Summary
AbstractSpanningTreeGenerator<E> Abstract class for spanning tree gen
BFSTraversal<E> Class encapsulating Breadth First Traversal Implements method to find shortest path between two nodes in linear time
DFSTraversal<E> Depth First Search Traversal Has Method for cycle detection and topological sort
Graph<E> Represents the Graph object.
Graph.Edge<E> An Edge class, holds from and to Vertex and the edge weight
Graph.Vertex<E>  
KruskalSpanningTreeGenerator<E> Min Spanning Tree Generator, Kruskal's Algorithm.
PrimSpanningTreeGenerator<E> Min Spanning Tree Generation, Prim's implementation, uses Binary Heap to decide the fringe minimum value vertex
SingleSourceShortestPathGenerator<E> Single source shortest path on Weighted Directed Graphs Implements Dijkstra's algorithm
Traversal<E> Base class for implementing Traversals on the Graph
Traversal.Node<E>  
TwoColoringTraversal<E> A Two coloring traversal, test to check if graph is bipartite .
 

Enum Summary
Traversal.Node.Color
